name: The Fallen (itch) (Velox)
description:
You are Eko, a mysterious creature that is on a quest for stars.

In this platformer, you are faced with puzzling things... and can't jump. Can you find all the stars or will the challenge be too tough?

CONTROLS:

Use the up and down arrow keys or the left stick/dpad of a controller...

This will increase your speed in the left or right directions.
